## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6226d5b0f89ec8275730cc47b85f33998f62c7a555a51ae59917a445ffb9e1d1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'install-crypto' @ 4.18.5 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
